name: Underfloor
description:
Mechanic prototype of a long-running adventure game, which contains mystical and futuristic aura.

Story

The Titans created a protector with the material they beat with their souls. This protector would appear when that day came and restore balance. But humanity perceived this as a threat and searched the protector for ages, even when the protector did not know who he was. And now even the humanity cannot control their own fate but a protector is awakened but there is a little problem he still remembers nothing and also he is UNDERFLOOR.

Team

Mehmet Kaan ALPER

Emre KİŞİOĞLU

Omar OUDA

CONTROLS

Keyboard & mouse only

 A & D to move - Space to jump - W & S to use ledder - progress text Mouse left click
